attributes.long-description:
This download includes the full version of the game. Raise, care and play with a family of hamsterz – for the first time on the PSP® system! Adopt hamsters with different fur types and colors. Keep them occupied with more than 50 fun events and watch them grow as you become a proud pet parent.

Adopt your favorite hamster from a wide variety:
• Play with a variety of hamsters, all with different fur types and colors.

Care for your hamsters and build strong bonds:
• Feed and pet your hamsters as you watch them grow.

Play with your hamster and watch them participate in 50 fun events:
• Give them toys to run around with.
• Watch them explore a variety of themed rooms full of fun activities such as hamster wheels and hamster houses!

High-quality game with realistic graphics: • Taking advantage of the PSP® system’s technology, the hamsters look as realistic as ever with new fur technology, motions and environments.

This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: Petz® Hamsterz Bunch™
